exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type h : nat -> option A Hstream : forall x y : nat, x < y -> h x = None -> h y = None y : nat a : A Ha : exist (fun h : nat -> option A => forall x y : nat, x < y -> h x = None -> h y = None) h Hstream (S y) = Some a IHy : exist (fun h : nat -> option A => forall x y : nat, x < y -> h x = None -> h y = None) h Hstream y = Some a -> forall x : nat, x <= y -> exists a : A, exist (fun h : nat -> option A => forall x0 y : nat, x0 < y -> h x0 = None -> h y = None) h Hstream x = Some a Unable to unify "h 1 = None" with "False".

original: intros A h x y Hle Hex. destruct h as [h Hstream]. destruct Hex as [a Ha]. revert x Hle. induction y. -- intros x Hle. inversion Hle; subst. ++ exists a. auto. ++ exfalso. apply (Hstream 0 1); auto. intros contra. inversion contra. -- intros x Hle. inversion Hle; subst. ++ now exists a. ++ apply IHy in H1. destruct H1 as [a' Ha']. exists a'. now apply Hstream with x y.
